Html:
Hi Guys, I have two questions:

1) In which way I can change the default text with custom for search button, no results messsage, etc...? I see the dictionary table in database but not find the text value.

2) To customize the render of searching page I should set the titleProperties, bodyProperties and others. For "list of properties" you mean the alias of properties or the id? I try to set alias but I don't see any changes.

Thanks and regards,
Giuseppe
